amendment.description: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part A of House Report 118-602 to prohibit funds made available by this Act to be used for the Savannah River Plutonium Modernization Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A005) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A005) Failed by voice vote.
